text.tspan: and Pigsty Web Service via IP is viable, replace 10.10.10.10 with primary IP
Access Web Subsystems via domain name is recommended, e.g:
will write related domain names into
demo, dcs3, mxdb, citus, redis, etc,…
Y: Download from Github Release now
INPUT: Primary IPv4 address of this node
(Use the IP for connecting, DO NOT USE Public Internet IP)

g.title:
源码 <必选项> pigsty.tgz --下载解压至—> ~/pigsty
软件 [可选项] pkg.tgz ————————-——> /tmp/pkg.tgz

源码 <必选项> pigsty.tgz --下载解压至—> ~/pigsty
软件 [可选项] pkg.tgz ————————-——> /tmp/pkg.tgz
